root.name: Fast Striker
root.description: FAST STRIKER is a 2D arcade shooting game with emphasis on scoring. You can choose between 3 game modes with different scoring systems. This game features six stages with over 40 unique enemy types, pre-rendered 3D sprites and pre-rendered video backgrounds. It's the biggest Neo Geo game in terms of megabits, clocking at 1560 megabits. Tough it's made for the Neo Geo arcade plataform, it will not be ported to the home console of the same name. It's not licenced by SNK Playmore. In 2011 it was released for Dreamcast, making it the most recent title for the system.
